ARABIC: هَٰذَا كِتَٰبُنَا يَنطِقُ عَلَيْكُم بِٱلْحَقِّ إِنَّا كُنَّا نَسْتَنسِخُ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This is Our Book speaking against you with the truth. We have been recording everything you did.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This, Our record, will speak about you truthfully. We had everything you did recorded in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: This is Our Record which bears witness against you with truth; We used to record all what you did.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is Our Book. It will tell you the truth. We have made a copy of all that you have done.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “This Book of Ours speaks against you with the truth; indeed We had been recording all what you did.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: This Our Record speaks about you with truth. Verily, We were recording what you used to do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This is Our book that speaks against you with justice; surely We wrote what you did,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: This is Our Book, that speaks against you the truth; We have been registering all that you were doing.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This Our Book pronounceth against you with truth. Lo! We have caused (all) that ye did to be recorded.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This record of ours will declare the truth about you: We have been recording whatever you have been doing."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: This Book of Ours speaketh against you with truth; verily We have been setting down whatsoever ye have been working.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: This is Our book, which speaks truly against you. Indeed We used to record what you used to do.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: This Our Record speaks about you with truth: For We were wont to put on Record all that ye did."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: This Our Record speaks about you with truth. Verily, We were recording what you used to do (i.e. Our angels used to record your deeds).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: This is Our Book that speaks with the truth over you. We have recorded all that you were doing'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This Book of Ours speaks about you in truth. We have been transcribing what you have been doing.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: This, Our record, speaks about you in truth. Indeed, We were having transcribed whatever you used to do."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [45:29] This is Our book, the register of [deeds recorded by] the guardian angels, which pronounces against you with truth. Indeed We used to write down, record and preserve, what you used to do’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 583 (This Our Book) i.e. the record of the guardian angels (pronounceth against you) testifies against you (with truth) with fairness. (Lo! We have caused (all) that ye did) and say in the life of the world (to be recorded.
